thread.title: BnkToTheFuture Launches Fund to Invest in Bitcoin Group as IPO Approaches
thread.title_full: BnkToTheFuture Launches Fund to Invest in Bitcoin Group as IPO Approaches

title: BnkToTheFuture Launches Fund to Invest in Bitcoin Group as IPO Approaches
text:
BnkToTheFuture Launches Fund to Invest in Bitcoin Group as IPO Approaches BnkToTheFuture Launches Fund to Invest in Bitcoin Group as IPO Approaches BnkToTheFuture has announced its launch of a fund to invest in Bitcoin Group in anticipation of its IPO. Advertising Print This Post Stock information is displayed on an electronic board inside the Australian Securities Exchange, operated by ASX Ltd., in Sydney, Australia, on Friday, July 24, 2015. Shares of Bitcoin Group will debut on November 11. Photographer: Brendon Thorne/Bloomberg 
BnkToTheFuture, a Bitcoin-focused crowdfunding platform, has announced its launch of a fund to invest in Bitcoin Group in anticipation of its IPO. 
Bitcoin group, whose primary business is the mining of bitcoins, was approved to go public on the Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) after a lengthy review process. The company got clearance early last month, making it the first crypto company to go public through the IPO process. All other publicly traded crypto companies took the “back door” route via the reverse merger process. 
Shares of Bitcoin Group will debut for trade on November 11 as ASX:BCG. 
The plans to issue 100 million new shares, at A$0.20 each, raising A$20 million ($14 million) through the offering. 
The crowdfunding platform has raised $2.96 million (81.5%) of its $3.63 million investment goal. 
Bitcoin mining is a high reward, high risk game for investors. Bitcoin prices have a major impact on profitability; unexpected drops can render well-capitalized operation unprofitable overnight. Conversely, any bitcoin price appreciation above the break-even point is pure gravy for investors. 
One ought to note that the other publicly traded crypto company in Australia, Digital BTC, was also involved primarily in bitcoin mining. However, it recently got out of the game after suffering losses. Got a news tip? Let Us Know FOUND A MISTAKE
